txt.en: Many of the Orcs that marched with the main horde moving across Rohan have fallen behind to continue occupying and terrorizing the peoples of the Norcrofts and to spread the influence of the White Hand.\n\nDefeating the White Hand's riders will help reduce their stranglehold on the territory.

'Knowing that the invaders have fallen to your prowess fills me with a sense of satisfaction. Each Orc slain in the fields delays the chance of their forces amassing to attack the city.\n\n'Keep vigilant, brave [placeholder].'

Many of the Orcs that marched with the main horde moving across Rohan have fallen behind to continue occupying and terrorizing the peoples of the Norcrofts and to spread the influence of the White Hand.
Defeated mounted Orcs in the western farmlands ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
Defeat mounted Orcs in the western farmlands ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
The abandoned farms can be found south and west of Cliving.\n\nMany of the mounted Orc-forces have continued to occupy and defile the abandoned farms.
Talk to Captain Garmund outside of Cliving
Captain Garmund can be found at the western watch-tower just west of Cliving.\n\nCaptain Garmund will be pleased to see your actions dealing with the Orc-invaders.
